project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, allowing users to calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Read CSV file and load data
Allow user to specify numerical columns for analysis
Implement function to calculate mean for specified columns
Implement function to calculate median for specified columns
Implement function to calculate mode for specified columns
Write tests for mean, median, and mode functions
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure correctness
